name: Cordyceps
description:
W- Jump                                                               You can only control 2 ants at once

  A- Left         S- Restart     D- Right

Your goal is to infect the queen. The ants have been farming you for food but you evolved. Take back your life and control the queen.

Built for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

Make sure to fullscreen the game, otherwise it may look strange.
